936:3: abhigamya śivena cakṣuṣā śramaṇaḥ kaściduvāca maitrayā||1||
936:4: kimidaṃ mukhamaśrudurdinaṃ hṛdayasthaṃ vivṛṇoti te tamaḥ|
936:5: dhṛtimehi niyaccha vikriyāṃ na hi bāṣpaśca śamaśca śobhate||2||
936:6: dvividhā samudeti vedanā niyataṃ cetasi deha eva ca|
936:8: tadiyaṃ yadi kāyikī rujā bhiṣaje tūrṇamanūnamucyatām|
936:10: atha duḥkhamidaṃ manomayaṃ vada vakṣyāmi yadatra bheṣajam|
936:12: nikhilena ca satyamucyatāṃ yadi vācyaṃ mayi saumya manyase|
936:13: gatayo vividhā hi cetasāṃ bahuguhyāni mahākulāni ca||6||
936:14: iti tena sa coditastadā vyavasāyaṃ pravivakṣurātmanaḥ|
936:15: avalambya kare kareṇa taṃ praviveśānyatarad vanāntaram||7||
936:16: atha tatra śucau latāgṛhe kusumodgāriṇi tau niṣedatuḥ|
936:20: sadṛśaṃ yadi dharmacāriṇaḥ satataṃ prāṇiṣu maitracetasaḥ|
936:21: adhṛtau yadiyaṃ hitaiṣitā mayi te syāt karuṇātmanaḥ sataḥ||10||
936:22: ata eva ca me viśeṣataḥ pravivakṣā kṣamavādini tvayi|
936:23: na hi bhāvamimaṃ calātmane kathayeyaṃ bruvate'pyasādhave||11||
936:24: tadidaṃ śrṛṇu me samāsato na rame dharmavidhāvṛte priyām|
936:26: vanavāsasukhāt parāṅmukhaḥ prayiyāsā gṛhameva yena me|
936:27: na hi śarma labhe tayā binā nṛpatirhīna ivottamaśriyā||13||
936:28: atha tasya niśamya tadvacaḥ priyabhāryābhimukhasya śocataḥ|
936:30: kṛpaṇaṃ bata yūthalālaso mahato vyādhabhayād viniḥsṛtaḥ|
936:32: vihagaḥ khalu jālasaṃvṛto hitakāmena janena mokṣitaḥ|
936:35: jalatarṣavaśena tāṃ punaḥ saritaṃ grāhavatīṃ titīrṣati||17||
936:36: śaraṇe sabhujaṅgame svapan pratibuddhena pareṇa bodhitaḥ|
936:37: taruṇaḥ khalu jātavibhramaḥ svayamugraṃ bhujagaṃ jighṛkṣati||18||
936:39: punaricchati nīḍatṛṣṇayā patituṃ tatra gatavyatho dvijaḥ||19||
936:40: avaśaḥ khalu kāmamūrcchayā priyayā śyenabhayād vinākṛtaḥ|
936:41: na dhṛtiṃ samupaiti na hriyaṃ karuṇaṃ jīvati jīvajīvakaḥ||20||
936:42: akṛtātmatayā tṛṣānvito ghṛṇayā caiva dhiyā ca varjitaḥ|
936:43: aśanaṃ khalu vāntamātmanā kṛpaṇaḥ śvā punarattumicchati||21||
936:45: śramaṇaḥ sa hitābhikāṅkṣayā guṇavad vākyamuvāca vipriyam||22||
936:47: upapannamalabdhacakṣuṣo na ratiḥ śreyasi ced bhavettava||23||
936:52: ramate tṛṣito dhanaśriyā ramate kāmasukhena bāliśaḥ|
936:53: ramate praśamena sajjanaḥ paribhogān paribhūya vidyayā||26||
936:55: sadṛśī na gṛhāya cetanā praṇatirvāyuvaśad gireriva||27||
936:57: upaśāntipathe śive sthitaḥ spṛhayeddoṣavate gṛhāya saḥ||28||
936:58: vyasanābhihato yathā viśet parimuktaḥ punareva bandhanam|
936:59: samupetya vanaṃ tathā punargṛhasaṃjñaṃ mṛgayeta bandhanam||29||
936:60: puruṣaśca vihāya yaḥ kaliṃ punaricchet kalimeva sevitum|
936:61: sa vihāya bhajeta bāliśaḥ kalibhūtāmajitendriyaḥ priyām||30||
936:62: saviṣā iva saṃśritā latāḥ parimṛṣṭā iva soragā guhāḥ|
936:63: vivṛtā iva cāsayo dhṛtā vyasanāntā hi bhavanti yoṣitaḥ||31||
936:64: pramadāḥ samadā madapradāḥ pramadā vitamadā bhayapradāḥ|
936:65: iti doṣabhayāvahāśca tāḥ kathamarhanti niṣevaṇaṃ nu tāḥ||32||
936:66: svajanaḥ svajanena bhidyate suhadaścāpi suhṛjjanena yat|
936:70: vacanena haranti valgunā niśitena praharanti cetasā|
936:71: madhu tiṣṭhati vāci yoṣitāṃ hṛdaye hālahalaṃ mahadviṣaśam||35||
936:72: pradahan dahano'pi gṛhyate viśarīraḥ pavano'pi gṛhyate|
936:73: kupito bhujago'pi gṛhyate pramadānāṃ tu mano na gṛhyate||36||
936:74: na vapurvimṛśanti na śriyaṃ na matiṃ nāpi kulaṃ na vikramam|
936:76: na vaco madhuraṃ na lālanaṃ smarati strī na ca sauhṛdaṃ kvacit|
936:78: adadatsu bhavanti narmadāḥ pradadatsu praviśanti vibhramam|
936:80: guṇavatsu caranti bhartṛvad guṇahīneṣu caranti putravat|
936:82: viṣayād viṣayāntaraṃ gatā pracaratyeva yathā hṛtāpi gau|
936:85: api bibhrati caiva yantraṇā na tu bhāvena vahanti sauhṛdam||42||
936:86: ramayanti patīn kathañcana pramadā yāḥ patidevatāḥ kvacit|
936:87: calacittatayā sahastraśo ramayante hṛdayaṃ svameva tāḥ||43||
936:88: śvapacaṃ kila senajitsutā cakame mīnaripuṃ kumudvatī|
936:93: kathamarhati tāsu paṇḍito hṛdayaṃ sañjayituṃ calātmasu||46||
936:94: atha sūkṣmamatidvayāśivaṃ laghu tāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ na paśyasi|
936:95: kimu kāyamasadgṛhaṃ sravad vanitānāmaśuciṃ na paśyasi||47||
936:98: athavā samavaiṣi tattanūmaśubhāṃ tvaṃ na tu saṃvidasti te|
936:101: yadi sādhu kimatra yoṣitāṃ sahajaṃ tāsu vicīyatāṃ śuci||50||
936:103: yadi sā tava sundarī bhavenniyataṃ te'dya na sundarī bhavet||51||
936:104: stravatīmaśuciṃ spṛśecca kaḥ saghṛṇo jarjarabhāṇḍavat striyam|
936:107: madanena ca kṛṣyase balādaghṛṇaḥ khalvadhṛtiśca manmathaḥ||53||
936:109: avicakṣaṇa kiṃ na paśyasi prakṛtiṃ ca prabhavaṃ ca yoṣitām||54||
936:112: śrutavān matimān kulodgataḥ paramasya praśamasya bhājanam|
936:113: upagamya yathā tathā punarna hi bhettuṃ niyamaṃ tvamarhasi||56||
936:115: nidhanamapi varaṃ sthirātmanaścyutavinayasya na caiva jīvitam||57||
936:120: hāsyo yathā ca paramābharaṇāmbarastrag bhaikṣaṃ caran dhṛtadhanuścalacitramauliḥ|
936:126: yatholkā hastasthā dahati pavanapreritaśikhā yathā pādākrānto daśati bhujagaḥ krodharabhasaḥ|
936:127: yathā hanti vyāghraḥ śiśurapi gṛhīto gṛhagataḥ tathā strīsaṃsargo bahuvidhamanarthāya bhavati||61||
936:129: matvā kāmasukhaṃ nadījalacalaṃ kleśāya śokāya ca|
936:132: saundarananda mahākāvye “strī-vighna“ nāma aṣṭama sarga samāpta|
